channel.title: Plz someone help!
channel.description: ok ive been stuck on this for a while ok when i fight in c wars when i die i lose all my stuff how do i change when i die in c wars i dont lose all my stuff i only want it in c wars not every where els plz i need a tut or something :confused:

item.title: Plz someone help!
item.dc:creator: @mrslayer mrslayer
item.description:
@mrslayer wrote:

ok i tried that and it dident work this is my code public void cwars() { if(absY >= 3088 && absY <= 3130 && absX >= 2368 && absX <= 2420) if(currentHealth < 1) { currentHealth = 0; } if(currentHealth == 0) { for(int r=0; r<playerEquipment.length; r++) { try { int item = playerEquipment[r]; if((item > 0) && (item < 10000)) { remove(item, r); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("ERROR: Removing Equipment"); } } for(int rr=0; rr<playerItems.length; rr++) { try { if(playerItems[rr] > 0 && playerItems[rr] < 10000) { deleteItem(playerItems[rr]-1, getItemSlot(playerItems[rr]-1), 1); } } catch(Exception e) { } } teleportToX = 3254; teleportToY = 3420; //pEmote = 15; //pWalk = 13; sendMessage("Oh dear you are dead!"); currentHealth = 99; hitDiff = 0; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } } and when i died there i lost all my stuff what did i put wrong?

item.title: Plz someone help!
item.dc:creator: @mrslayer mrslayer
item.description:
@mrslayer wrote:

i found something like that but it about the duelarena and also what cords would i put in if i die anywhere in side c wars? would i just do it like makeing a safe zone? or what.[br][size=1]Posted on: September 08, 2007, 12:13:30 AM[/size][hr]heres the code i found [code] public boolean ApplyDeadDuel() {
if (IsDeadTimer == false) {
actionAmount++;
actionTimer = 0;
resetDuel();
ResetAttack();
ResetAttackNPC();
pEmote = 0x900;
IsDeadTimer = true;
ApplyDeadDuel();
}
if (actionTimer == 0 && IsDeadTimer == true) {
teleportToX = 3377;
teleportToY = 3283;
IsDeadTeleporting = true;
frame1(); // Xerozcheez: Resets animation
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
setSkillLevel(3, getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]), playerXP[playerHitpoints]);
playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
setSkillLevel(5, getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]), playerXP[5]);
playerLevel[5] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]);
refreshSkills();
PoisonDelay = 9999999;
KillerId = playerId;
resetKeepItem();
resetDuel();
resetItems(3214);
sendMessage(“Oh dear you lost the duel!”);
}
return true;
}

public void resetDuel() {
	duelWith = 0;
            duelStatus = -1;
            winDuel = false;
	for (int i = 0; i < duelItems.length; i++) {
                    duelRule[i] = false;
		duelItems[i] = 0;
		duelItemsN[i] = 0;
		otherDuelItems[i] = 0;
		otherDuelItemsN[i] = 0;
	}
}

[/code] can you tell me what to change to make that about c wars?

Read full topic

item.title: Plz someone help!
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

An Example:

public void KBDLair() { if(absY >= 9517 && absY <= 9546 && absX >= 2630 && absX <= 2650) if(MonsterDelay <= 1) { hitDiff = 3 + misc.random(78); sendMessage("You get hit!"); MonsterDelay = 40; currentHealth -= hitDiff; updateRequired = true; hitUpdateRequired = true; inCombat(); } if(currentHealth < 1) { currentHealth = 0; } if(currentHealth == 0) { for(int r=0; r 0) && (item < 10000)) { remove(item, r); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("ERROR: Removing Equipment"); } }

for(int rr=0; rr<playerItems.length; rr++) {
try {
if(playerItems[rr] > 0 && playerItems[rr] < 10000) {
deleteItem(playerItems[rr]-1, getItemSlot(playerItems[rr]-1), 1);
}
} catch(Exception e) { }
}
removeAllItems();
teleportToY = 3254;
teleportToY = 3420;
//pEmote = 15;
//pWalk = 13;
sendMessage(“Oooh ownt plawx?”);
setSkillLevel(3, 99, playerLevel[3]);
currentHealth = 99;
hitDiff = 0;
updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
}

first the X and Y’s of castle wars, the inside not outside. then i guess copy and paste all that after from this code, Make neccesary changes, where you teleport when you die, etc.

Now where it says removeAllItems();s? delete it, we don’t want that. you want to keep your items.

for(int r=0; r 0) && (item < 10000)) { remove(item, r); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("ERROR: Removing Equipment"); } }

for(int rr=0; rr<playerItems.length; rr++) {
try {
if(playerItems[rr] > 0 && playerItems[rr] < 10000) {
deleteItem(playerItems[rr]-1, getItemSlot(playerItems[rr]-1), 1);
}
} catch(Exception e) { }
}

That would remove your equipement and items on you…So idk, don’t add that part?

I guess so far thats right, in my opinion, correct me if i’m wrong?
Though i just read the code myself.

Read full topic
